text.p: KeyCorp, a financial services company, said Monday it has completed its acquisition of Leastec Corp, a privately-held equipment leasing company based in Boulder, Colo.
Terms of the acquisition, which was initially announced in April, were not disclosed.
Leasetec specializes in leasing information technology and telecommunications equipment to large companies.
KeyCorp said that Leasetec's $1.1 billion portfolio will raise its leasing receivables to about $4.0 billion.
KeyCorp, with assets of $67 billion, is in corporate banking, consumer finance and community banking.
